archimate:BusinessObject.name: Verification enabling system requirements
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation: Requirements for any systems needed to enable verification of the system of interest

properties.value: Laut INCOSE Handbuch 4.0 - übersetzt von GfSE: "Die Anforderungen an die verifikationsunterstützenden Systeme umfassen die Anforderungen an alle Systeme, die die Verifikation des Zielsystems ermöglichen."
Requirements for any systems needed to enable verification of the system of interest
